mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM rnum, A.ASSIGN_NUM, A.LECT_NUM, L.LECT_NAME, A.TEACHER_ID, T.NAME, A.DAY, A.BEGINTIME, A.ENDTIME, A.STATUS FROM ASSIGN_LECT A, LECTURE L, TEACHER T WHERE A.LECT_NUM = L.LECT_NUM AND A.TEACHER_ID = T.ID

SELECT A.ASSIGN_NUM, A.DAY, A.BEGINTIME, A.ENDTIME FROM ASSIGN_LECT A, LECTURE L, TEACHER T WHERE A.TEACHER_ID = T.ID AND A.LECT_NUM = L.LECT_NUM AND A.LECT_NUM = #{lect_num} AND A.TEACHER_ID = #{teacher_id} AND A.STATUS = 0 ORDER BY CASE A.DAY WHEN '월요일' THEN 1 WHEN '화요일' THEN 2 WHEN '수요일' THEN 3 WHEN '목요일' THEN 4 WHEN '금요일' THEN 5 END , CAST(substr(A.BEGINTIME,1,2)AS INT) ASC
SELECT DISTINCT A.TEACHER_ID, T.NAME FROM ASSIGN_LECT A, TEACHER T WHERE A.TEACHER_ID = T.ID AND A.LECT_NUM = #{lect_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASSIGN_LECT (ASSIGN_NUM, LECT_NUM, TEACHER_ID, DAY, BEGINTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS) VALUES (ASSIGN_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{lect_num}, #{teacher_id}, #{day}, #{begintime}, #{endtime}, DEFAULT)
